name: CS_VA_Correction_Methods
title: Visual Acuity Correction Methods
description: Correction Methods not covered by snomed

concept.definition: Trial lenses used for visual acuity testing based on values obtained from an autorefractor.

concept.display: Trial Lenses - Values from Manifest Refraction without Cycloplegia
concept.definition: Trial lenses used for visual acuity testing based on values from manifest refraction without cycloplegia.

concept.display: Trial Lenses - Values from Manifest Refraction with Cycloplegia
concept.definition: Trial lenses used for visual acuity testing based on values from manifest refraction with cycloplegia.
Trial lenses used for visual acuity testing based on values from retinoscopy.

concept.display: Trial Lenses - Values of Unspecified Origin
concept.definition: Trial lenses used for visual acuity testing where the origin of the refractive values is unspecified.
